author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-187: First commit of the new Indexing infrastructure
This includes the core infrastructure and implementations for
- Indexing RDF data (based on jena TDB)
- Storing indexed Entities to the SolrYard
- The old indexing utils are not yet moved to this infrastructure
- Readme and documentations of the configuration
I will write a comment for STANBOL-187 providing more details
- added some utilities to the FieldMappingUtils
- The SolrDirectoryManager now checks if the solr.xml is present and not only if the configured directory exist
